title: Hell Hound
contents: property | Senses | darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15
property | Languages | understands Infernal but can't speak it
description | Keen Hearing and Smell | The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
description | Pack Tactics | The hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
description | Bite | Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft ., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

description | Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6) | The hound exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
